frontmatter.title: VEO submits the tenth report on mutations and variation in publicly shared SARS-CoV-2 raw sequencing data.
frontmatter.description: In its tenth report to the European Commission, VEO Consortium members summarize mobilisation and analysis of SARS-CoV-2 sequence data submitted to the European COVID-19 Data Platform in the context of the VEO project, which aims to develop tools and data analytics for pandemic and outbreak preparedness.
